import { Link, Navigate, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { products } from "../../data/products"; import './Details.css'; function Details() { const { ID } = useParams(); let product = products.filter((elem) => elem.ID == ID); return ( <> {!ID ? :
{product.map((elem) => <>
  1. Home
  2. Shop
  3. {elem.article}

{elem.article}

{elem.description}

Max 10 items per order

â‚¬ {elem.price}

Description

{elem.description}

Components

{elem.ingredients.map((ingredient)=>`${ingredient}, `)}

)}
} ) }; export default Details;
